missions.title: Mission 1: Zara's First Move
missions.description: Guide Zara the DinoBot to the lost city by moving her forward!

missions.title: Mission 2: The Turning Point
missions.description: Teach Zara to turn left and right to navigate obstacles.

missions.title: Mission 3: The Looping Path
missions.description: Use loops to help Zara cross the Dino Bridge.

missions.title: Mission 4: The Sensor Challenge
missions.description: Use sensors to avoid danger and reach the city gates.

missions.title: FINALE: Save the Lost Dino City!
missions.description: Combine all your skills to help Zara save the city!
